text:
e="preserve">Gam-COVID-Vac (, "Gam-KOVID-Vak"), trade-named Sputnik V, is a COVID-19 vaccine created by the Gamaleya Research Institute of Epidemiology and Microbiology, and registered on 11 August 2020 by the Russian Ministry of Health.
Gam-COVID-Vac has been approved for distribution in Russia.

annotations.surface_form: Gamaleya Research Institute of Epidemiology and Microbiology
